RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 66. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU GOTTA HAVE FUN (IRE) pressed from the inside early wresting a clear lead mid turn being hooked from the outside in upper stretch battling back gamely for the narrowest of wins. MADY ROSE rallied along the inside on the turn drawing even abreast rival in upper stretch matching strides to the wire just missing. CHICAGO CAT tracked evenly on the turn proving no match in upper stretch mustering enough to hold the others. GRAND VENUS pressed early three deep wavering on the turn fading to upper stretch. BAY OF ANGELS played no factor. CONNECT IT pressed early between horses weakening on the turn fading to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mady Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Sullivan Farms LLC and Dunloe Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied inside on the turn, drew even abreast lane, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Bay of Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: You Gotta Have Fun (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, clear turn, hooked top lane, up gamely inside

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: R J B Bloodstock & Lynch Bages Ltd

ENTRY.NAME: Chicago Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, dispatched lane, gained held spot

ENTRY.NAME: Connect It
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Venus
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep. faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Co nsidered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023 Preferred). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLATTER ME PLEASE rallied to draw even on the backside dueling through the far turn into upper stretch unable to put away rival down the lane needing all to win out. PERFETTO pressed a short lead dueling through the far turn battling down the lane responding to the end along the inside. A LATE ONE tracked evenly through the backside dropping off the leaders in upper stretch moving evenly there as best of others. PIONEER DANCER played no factor. TODAY MATTERS was never involved. NOT SO EASY gave a prompted middle move then flattened out on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: A Late One
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, no match lane, held others

ENTRY.NAME: Pioneer Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Today Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed short lead, dueled inside far turn, battled gamely lane

ENTRY.NAME: Flatter Me Please
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled abreast far turn, extended lane, needed all

ENTRY.NAME: Not So Easy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARIPOSA D'ORO hustled off to the early lead moved on a large margin through the far turn into upper stretch becoming weary late reaching the wire safely. HONEY BOURBON unhurried early emerged off a loose leader on the far turn angling out past mid track in upper stretch gaining ground after the fact. KITTEN BY THE SEA tracked a loose leader to the far turn weakening there racing evenly down the lane to hold spot. MAYAN QUEEN was never involved. CHECK SIX folded up on the backside.

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, emerged far turn, angled wide lane, closed gap

ENTRY.NAME: Mayan Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Mariposa d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled off early, kept large margin to lane, weary, held clear

ENTRY.NAME: Kitten by the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked loose leader, weakened to lane, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Check Six
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on the backside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In El igibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERO'S DAUGHTER set the pace moving off on the backside saving ground through the far turn widening along the rail down the lane being ridden out. HUMMIN' THE FUNK slow early gained some on the far turn vying near mid track down the lane getting up for place. PANGEA stalked the pace giving chase through the far turn racing four wide down the lane giving an even finish. LADY MECHANIC tracked three deep chasing through the far turn into upper stretch weakening late. SEMIRAMIS raced evenly through the far turn weakening in upper stretch. CHALDEA hustled along the inside chased to the quarter pole wearing out in upper stretch. WACKER'S GIRL dropped back early. ESTA CALIENTE was always outrun. ANOTHER FLIRT hustled along was used up on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Daughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off backside, saved ground to lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Chaldea
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside, chased to 1/4 pole, wore out lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pangea
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, 4 wide lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Hummin' the Funk
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained far turn, rallied up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Another Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, used up far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Wacker's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked three deep, pursued far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Esta Caliente
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHOCO ROCO stumbled at the break rushing hard after pressing to clear in upper stretch digging in gamely to outside pressure late. IMISSBAYMEADOWS away alertly set the pace being passed from the inside in upper stretch continuing on to pressure to the wire. DADDY Z chased through the turn weakening in upper stretch. FIFTY PESOS dropped back into the turn easing down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Choco Roco
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled break, rushed inside, led top lane, dug in late

ENTRY.NAME: Daddy Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fifty Pesos
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Imissbaymeadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, passed from inside, pressed to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST RIDE pressed the pace wresting a clear lead on the turn widening in upper stretch holding firm the final eighth. PORTIA'S HOPE chased through the turn extending into upper stretch responding late to salvage place. CLASSY REY DE ORO tracked evenly through the turn chasing into upper stretch continuing with even action gaining a spot late. PETITE N' SMITTY sent hard led early ceding on the turn weakening in upper stretch. WHY WINCHILL WHY played no factor. XCELLENTLY TIMED chased early fading to upper stretch. S S CAESAR was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed pace, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since M ay 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ESCAPE VELOCITY away alertly set the pace coming under pressure on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch digging in late between horses. HOBE SOUND stalked the pace saving ground to emerge a threat from the rail in upper stretch vying willingly to the wire. INDIAN EMPIRE stalked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn extending outside of rivals down the lane staying on to the end. HIGH ROLLING DUDE gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. PEACE OF EKATI was never involved. PICKFORD raced mid pack fading to upper stretch. DAVIS HAT folded up early.

ENTRY.OWNER: Baird, John W. and Harbison, Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, emerged on rail lane, vied willingly to wire

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 25, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAD KARMA pressed the pace shaking clear on the turn widened in upper stretch winning as much the best. ROMANTIC JEWEL pressed then chased to upper stretch proving no match for the winner there saving place. BELLA BASORA raced evenly to upper stretch finishing evenly to hold position. NANCYSAIDSO pressed early then dropped off on the turn finishing evenly. OUT OF ROMANCE played no factor. AVENIDA MANANA faded on the turn.
